review: Amazons Firestick met my expectations as a useful add-on to my TV set.  My son-in-law installed it in about 20minutes.  Apps are easy to get and use once you get an account with Amazon.  I like the idea of an RF wireless controller design as there's no issues with making sure you have to point it to the device.  The only down side to the regular controller is sometimes it double clicks which means you can pass the selection you want to make and you have to back track.  I'm going to get the upgrade controller soon because of that.  It's too bad I can't use my Kindle touch with the Fire stick as I could use it to type in text for searches much easier.
